Package cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EventAdminException
    Exception for communicating between EventAdmin and its controllers.
    NonExistingUserException
    An exception thrown by UserManager when there is no user.
    NotAPlayerException
    This exception is thrown when the user is not a member of {@link cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.entities.Player
    PlayerManagerException
    This exception is for communication between PlayerManager and its controllers.
    UserAdminException
    This exception is for communicating between UserAdmin and its controllers.
    UserManagerException
    This exception is for communicating between UserManager and its controllers.
    WrongInputException
    This exception is thrown when validation of form input fails.
    WrongUserPassword
    This exception is thrown by UserManager when the password is incorrect.
